assessmentHeadTip.message: By setting up assessment strategy, students' performance in courseware learning, assignments, examination and other activities can be included in the assessment system, so as to realize the comprehensive assessment of the combination of formative and summative results. After the assessment strategy is created, the system will automatically summarize and calculate the final results of the students.

classsroomHeadTips.message: Classroom refers to the roll call, poll, quick answering and other class activities you initiate on the mobile phone. Currently, the system only supports initiating activities on mobile phones. For PC version, you can only view the data of the activities.

classsroomNoDataTips.message: There is no data at the moment. Class activities should be launched on the APP

discussionHeadTips.message: An open discussion helps students to think deeply. You can post topics here and organize students to discuss them. Course administrators can initiate discussions for all classes; teachers and teaching assistants can initiate discussions only for their own classes.

noDiscussionTips.message: No discussion, click "Publish discussion" to add

delteteDiscussionTips.message: Are you sure to delete the discussion？

homeworkHeadTips1.message: All assignments and tests from your class for this course are shown here. Course administrators can view all class assignments, and teachers and teaching assistants can view only their own class assignments.

homeworkHeadTips2.message: All individual assignments, group assignments, and tests published by your class are here. Please pay attention to the start and end times of assignments and tests. Please complete the tasks on time

memberSpocValidateTips13.message: When the class is deleted, all students in the class will be removed from the class and the records of all activities that students participate in will be erased. Please be careful. Confirm to delete?

memberSpocValidateTips14.message: Each class should be designated with at least one teacher

memberSpocValidateTips19.message: When a student moves to a new class, his/her learning record may be erased if the new class does not have the activities that he/she participated in in the original class. Please be careful. Confirm to switch?

memberSpocValidateTips22.message: Removing students from the course will delete students' records of assignments, discussions, exams and other activities in the course. Please be careful.

memberSpocValidateTips24.message: Remove the teacher from the course

memberSpocValidateTips25.message: Removing the teacher from the course will not delete the classes he or she created in the course, so do the resources and activities published. If there are no other teachers in his or her class, the class will be transferred to the course creator.

textbookHeadTips.message: The courseware is introduced by the course administrator。class administrator can edit the courseware and load it into the course, or import from the courseware library. For paid textbook / courses, students need to pay and activate the course to start learning. All classes in the same course use the same courseware, but study plans can be set differently.

textbookTips1.message: Select and import from courseware bank

textbookTips2.message: Reminder: students need to purchase and activate the course/textbook before studying

noCourseware2.message: There is no courseware currently, please choose another way to import or edit courseware

textbookTips4.message: Courseware has not been loaded into the current course. You can import it from my courseware or the courseware library

coursewareNotActivated.message: Courseware has not been activated yet

textbookTips7.message: Please activate the courseware before studying!

textbookTips9.message: Courseware needs to be activated under your own account, please do not activate it for others.

textbookTips11.message: The results of PC and mobile versions of this courseware are not compatible. You can switch to check the progress grades of both sides. ( In order to facilitate the teacher to calculate results later, you'd better use the same equipment to complete studying all the times.)

textbookTips13.message: The courseware with the same name already exists in our school. Please change the name

semesterManageTip.message: Open courses, the default self-learning mode. If your open course needs to be started in stages and students from outside schools can join the class, you can create a semester here and set up related classes. After the association, when the foreign students join the course, they can automatically join the corresponding class.

selfLearnerTip.message: (refers to the number of students who have not joined the class for each semester)

descTip.message: Windows system supports only Win 7 version and above. Mac user should use only website broadcast, client side is not supported.

publishTips.message: Tip: the newly created micro course will be automatically saved to the resource bank. The course can be hidden before nish editing. After closing the page, micro course can be found in the resource bank and continue to be edited or published

microEmptyTips.message: Fragmented symbols are only information but structured information becomes knowledge

importFileTips.message: Importing files now, please wait for a while…

publishMicroTips.message: Confirm to publish micro course? The micro course has been saved to the resource bank. If the recording has not been fnished, you can edit it in the resource bank and then publish it later

publishMicroTips2.message: Students can start learning immediately after the micro course publishes. Confirm to publish?

progressTips1.message: Student’s learning progression = Learned pages / total pages of micro course*100%

progressTips2.message: The status of learning of the page：

progressTips3.message: 'For the pages including audio, counted as complete when duration of students listening to audio >= 90% of audio ration ；

progressTips4.message: For pages that does not contain audio, counted as complete once the student has viewed the page

courseTextbooksSupportTips.message: This courseware only supports the statistics of learning achievements and learning hours, and does not support the statistics of learning progress

noSupportSaveActiveTips.message: If there are textbooks that do not support courseware learning progress scoring items, please remove the courseware learning progress scoring items or remove the unsupported textbooks and save them
